thread.title: Parineeti Chopra Debuts Her New Haircut, And We Love It!
thread.title_full: Parineeti Chopra Debuts Her New Haircut, And We Love It!

title: Parineeti Chopra Debuts Her New Haircut, And We Love It!
text:
facebook 222 SHARES 
Bollywood actress Parineeti Chopra seems to take the "new year, new me" adage quite seriously. Last year, the actress wowed us with her transformation, and gave us crazy fitness goals. This year, the actress has started off 2017 with another new look -a new haircut. Pari uploaded a video to her Instagram page, yesterday, of herself at Kromakay salon getting her new do blow-dried. She is sporting a shoulder-length cut, very different from her long tresses, and we're loving it. Check out her new haircut, here. A video posted by Parineeti Chopra (@parineetichopra) on Jan 4, 2017 at 6:11am PST Image credit: Instagram
